p: Comparing water and ethanol as solvents, and maceration with ultrasound-assisted extraction methods, it was found that water is better in extracting α-phellandrene (13.04%) than 70% ethanol (1.41%), but worse in γ-asarone (0.79% versus 2.07%), cis-p-menth-2-en-1-ol (0.43% versus 5.88%), 4-carene, trans-(+)-(3.37% versus 6.56%) ( Table 2).
